title: Adamant thrownaxe

properties.name: description
properties.value: The adamant thrownaxe is the third strongest type of throwing axe, requiring level 30 Ranged to wield. They can be obtained by buying them from the Tribal Weapon Salesman in the Ranging Guild.

The adamant thrownaxe is the third strongest type of throwing axe, requiring level 30 Ranged to wield. They can be obtained by buying them from the Tribal Weapon Salesman in the Ranging Guild.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
10 December 2014
(update)

The item was renamed from "Addy thrownaxe" to "Adamant thrownaxe".

15 - 29 May 2007

The item was renamed from "Adamnt thrownaxe" to "Addy thrownaxe".

29 March 2004
(update)

The item became permanently available with the launch of RuneScape 2.

21 January 2004
(update)

The item became obtainable in the RuneScape 2 Beta.

1 December 2003
(update)

The item was added to the RuneScape 2 Beta cache.

[[File:Adamant thrownaxe detail.png|left|130px]]
The '''adamant thrownaxe''' is the third strongest type of [[throwing axe]], requiring level 30 [[Ranged]] to wield. They can be obtained by buying them from the [[Tribal Weapon Salesman]] in the [[Ranging Guild]].
